name: Level Up (BloodKillerr)
description:
Welcome!

Level Up is an adventure, rpg game that I'm currently working on.
For now, it's just a demo version made up of the tutorial levels.
I hope, that I'll be able to get a comments about what I can change/improve, so feel free to leave a few words after playing it.
Also, game is created using my native language, so sorry for the inconvenience.

Here are the controls for the game:
WASD - movement
E - interact
Q F - potions
TAB - inventory
ESC - menu
LMB - normal attack
RMB - strong attack
1-4 - abilities (not accesible yet)

One last thing. Because I'm creating it on my own, I was not able to create my own music, that's why I used music from other creators. So, songs listed below are not mine!

Wonderland by Alexander Nakarada: 

Relaxing Green Nature by David Fesliyan:
